body_html:
Thanks @Arafatk ! Nice to hear.

From a cursory look, it does seem that this is building ontop of c_api.h using the approach outlined in the how-to, which is great.

If you have concerns around the C API or the how-to, please do let us know with a separate issue (since those files are meant to be useful across all language bindings).
body_text:
Thanks @Arafatk ! Nice to hear.

body:
Thanks @Arafatk ! Nice to hear.

From a cursory look, it does seem that this is building ontop of [c_api.h](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h) using the approach outlined in the [how-to](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/g3doc/how_tos/language_bindings/index.md), which is great.

If you have concerns around the C API or the how-to, please do let us know with a separate issue (since those files are meant to be useful across all language bindings).
